> *observableJS* mixing import class, fetch&display.

::: {#inputDiv}
any input comes here
:::

```{ojs}
//================== INPUT
import { html } from "@observablehq/stdlib";

// Inputs
viewof userRef = html`<input type="text" 
  class="form-control" 
  style="width: 150px;"
  value="ps40"/>`;
  
// VIEWOF
html`<div class="row container">
  Lookup&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
  ${viewof userRef}
  ${userRef}
  </div>` 
```

::: {#outputDiv}
any output comes here
:::

```{ojs}
import { Book_Ref } from "./bookref.js";
// FUNCTIONS are in BibleBooksCodes.js, a Module handling BibleBooksCodes functions.

random = {
  const BBC = Book_Ref.fromRandom(7); // invoke this static class method !
  return BBC
  }
random;

user = {
  const BBC = Book_Ref.fromInput('matt6:33'); // invoke this static class method !
  const result = await BBC.singleFetch();
  return result;
  }
user;


```
